Trigger.name: hiding on off
Trigger.script:
local knownhide = false local knowncamo = false
if string.lower(matches[5]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[5]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[5]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4) then
create_tfe_database() local mydb = db:get_database("skills")
if gmcp.Char.Score.level > 59 then
local results = db:fetch(mydb.abilities, { db:eq(mydb.abilities.ability, "camouflage"), db:eq(mydb.abilities.character, gmcp.Char.Score.name), db:eq(mydb.abilities.account, gmcp.Char.Score.account)})
if next(results) then for _, row in ipairs(results) do if tonumber(row.level) > 0 then knowncamo = true disableTrigger("hide on death") enableTrigger("camo on death") end end else knowncamo = false end end
if gmcp.Char.Score.level > 2 and knowncamo == false then
local results = db:fetch(mydb.abilities, { db:eq(mydb.abilities.ability, "hide"), db:eq(mydb.abilities.character, gmcp.Char.Score.name), db:eq(mydb.abilities.account, gmcp.Char.Score.account)})
if next(results) then for _, row in ipairs(results) do if tonumber(row.level) > 0 then knownhide = true disableTrigger("camo on death") enableTrigger("hide on death") end end else knownhide = false end end
if string.lower(matches[7]) == "on" then send("gstatus " .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. " has hiding enabled.") enableTrigger("AutoHiding") if knowncamo then send("|camo") end if knownhide then send("|hide") end elseif string.lower(matches[7]) == "off" then send("gstatus " .. gmcp.Char.Score.name .. " has hiding disabled.") disableTrigger("AutoHiding") if knowncamo then send("|uncamo") end if knownhide then send("|unhide") end end end

Trigger.name: help
Trigger.script:
if (string.lower(matches[6]) == string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[6]),1,3) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) or string.sub(string.lower(matches[6]),1,4) == string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,4)) and string.lower(matches[7]) == "help" then
expandAlias("standardhelp") send("|gstatus gstatus '" .. string.sub(string.lower(gmcp.Char.Score.name),1,3) .. " hiding <on|off>'. (works for hide or camo)") send("|gstatus gstatus 'p or pick <direction>' for me to pick door locks.") send("|gstatus gstatus 'utc' for me to loot a chest, untrap a door, or basically do anything thiefy.")
end

Trigger.name: utc
Trigger.script:
--myVariableTable["ThiefInspectCounter"] = 0 --enableTrigger("ThiefChests") --send("look")
disableTrigger("ThiefChestPicking") disableTrigger("ThiefChestUntrapping") disableTrigger("ThiefChestInspecting") cecho("<orange>\n"..tostring(chestConfigExists).."\n") --Determine if a chest configuration exists based off room # local chestConfigExists = CheckChestConfiguration() inspectattempts = 0 if chestConfigExists == false then send("|gstatus Configuration does not exist for this chest.") return end
--Determine how to start the chest
local chestUntrapFirst = CheckChestUntrapFirst() local chestKeyWord = getChestKeyword()
if gmcp.Room.Info.num == 46509 then send("|search straw") end
if chestUntrapFirst == false then enableTrigger("ThiefChestPicking") send("|pick "..chestKeyWord) else enableTrigger("ThiefChestInspecting") send("|inspect "..chestKeyWord) end

Trigger.name: death
Trigger.script:
onDeath()
tempTimer(10, [[ send ("gstatus Attempting to stand.") send ("cstatus Attempting to stand.") send ("stand") ]])
tempTimer(15, [[ send ("gstatus Attempting to go north one to death.") send ("cstatus Attempting to go north one to death.") send ("north & east") ]])
tempTimer(20, [[ send ("gstatus Attempting to have death take me to Medienne.") send ("cstatus Attempting to have death take me to Medienne.") send ("to death med") ]])
tempTimer(25, [[ send ("gstatus Ok I should be in Medienne at the Crossroads.") send ("cstatus Ok I should be in Medienne at the Crossroads.") send ("gstatus Tell me or gstatus 'reportpos' to confirm.") ]])

Script.name: GetChestInfo
Script.script:
function CheckChestConfiguration() --Create Database if not exists, otherwise update table schema create_tfe_database()
--Load Database to local variable local mydb = db:get_database("skills")
local mysql = "select * from ThiefChestInfo where ChestRoomNumber = '"..tostring(gmcp.Room.Info.num).."' limit 1" local results = db:fetch_sql(mydb.ThiefChestInfo, mysql)
if results[1] == nil then return false --Configuration does NOT exist else return true --Configuration exists end end
function CheckChestUntrapFirst() --Create Database if not exists, otherwise update table schema create_tfe_database()
--Load Database to local variable local mydb = db:get_database("skills")
local mysql = "select * from ThiefChestInfo where ChestRoomNumber = '"..tostring(gmcp.Room.Info.num).."' and UntrapFirst = 1 limit 1" local results = db:fetch_sql(mydb.ThiefChestInfo, mysql)
if results[1] == nil then return false --Either chest is not trapped, or needs to be picked first before untrapping else return true --Untrap Chest First end end
function CheckChestUntrapSecond() --Create Database if not exists, otherwise update table schema create_tfe_database()
--Load Database to local variable local mydb = db:get_database("skills")
local mysql = "select * from ThiefChestInfo where ChestRoomNumber = '"..tostring(gmcp.Room.Info.num).."' and UntrapFirst = 0 and IsTrapped = 1 limit 1" local results = db:fetch_sql(mydb.ThiefChestInfo, mysql)
if results[1] == nil then return false --Either chest is not trapped, or needs to be picked first before untrapping else return true --Untrap Chest Second end end
function getChestKeyword() --Create Database if not exists, otherwise update table schema create_tfe_database()
--Load Database to local variable local mydb = db:get_database("skills")
local mysql = "select * from ThiefChestInfo where ChestRoomNumber = '"..tostring(gmcp.Room.Info.num).."' limit 1" local results = db:fetch_sql(mydb.ThiefChestInfo, mysql) display(results) if results[1] == nil then return "<no configuration>" else return tostring(results[1].ChestKeyWord) end end
function getChestIsLocked() --Create Database if not exists, otherwise update table schema create_tfe_database()
--Load Database to local variable local mydb = db:get_database("skills")
local mysql = "select * from ThiefChestInfo where ChestRoomNumber = '"..tostring(gmcp.Room.Info.num).."' and IsLocked = 1 limit 1" local results = db:fetch_sql(mydb.ThiefChestInfo, mysql)
if results[1] == nil then return false --Either chest is not trapped, or needs to be picked first before untrapping else return true --Untrap Chest Second end end
